org.gradoop.flink.io.impl.image

Class ImageDataSink.ImageGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.flink.io.impl.image.ImageDataSink.ImageGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    ImageDataSink

    protected static class ImageDataSink.ImageGenerator
extends Object
implements Serializable
    This class contains functionality to create images from graph-parts. For some strange reasons BufferedImage can not be used as DataSet-Type without crashing the JVM. Therefore byte[] is used as intermediate-representation.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
